flavorText: Starke believes in situational ethics—the situation determines the ethics. He's switched sides so often that he has become everyone's ally yet no one's friend. This former merchant of Rath accompanies the *Weatherlight* crew on their journey to his home world.
name: Starke
originalText: During your draw phase, you may draw an additional card and then put any card in your hand on the bottom of your library.
text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw an additional card. If you do, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
